platformUnitSales.name: Nintendo DS Hardware Total
platformUnitSales.footnote: Nintendo DS means Nintendo DS, Nintendo DS Lite, Nintendo DSi and Nintendo DSi XL.

platformUnitSales.name: Nintendo DS Software Total
platformUnitSales.footnote: The figures in actual sales units and number of new titles for Nintendo DS do not include the quantity of the Nintendo DSiWare titles. Actual software sales units include the quantity bundled with hardware.

platformUnitSales.name: Nintendo 3DS Software Total
platformUnitSales.footnote: The figures in actual sales units and number of new titles for Nintendo 3DS do not include the quantity of downloadable games in the Nintendo eShop. Actual software sales units include the quantity bundled with hardware.

platformUnitSales.name: Wii Software Total
platformUnitSales.footnote: The figures in actual sales units and number of new titles for Wii do not include the quantities of Virtual Console and the WiiWare titles. Actual software sales units include the quantity bundled with hardware.

platformForecastSales.name: Nintendo DS Software Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Forecasted software sales units do not include the quantity bundled with hardware.

platformForecastSales.name: Nintendo 3DS Software Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Forecasted software sales units do not include the quantity bundled with hardware.

platformForecastSales.name: Wii Hardware Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Forecasted Wii hardware and software sales units include the quantity of Wii U hardware and software.

platformForecastSales.name: Wii Software Total
platformForecastSales.footnote: Forecasted Wii hardware and software sales units include the quantity of Wii U hardware and software. Forecasted sales units of Nintendo 3DS software and Wii U software contained in Wii software include the quantity of the packaged software by means of digital distribution. Forecasted software sales units do not include the quantity bundled with hardware.
